column8:
Hayato 
Yuki 
Ōshiro Mugen
Takuma 
Aiko 
Kuma
Shogun
Ryūnosuke
Yabu
Okkoto
Noboru
Masaru
column10:
1) Aiko and Hayato are here to kidnap Masaru
2) They'll spy on his men and find out he is in the bathhouse
3) Then they'll kidnap and question him with Takuma to find out Noboru's plans
4) Hayato is driven by revenge after Mugen's death
5) Aiko keeps him in check and slowly shows that she is the new leader.
Hayato and Aiko have entered the district where Masaru's house and business are located.
This city is beautiful at night. We will find ample shadows here, don't you think, Hayato-san.
column12: 这里的夜景真美，应该会有大量阴暗区域便于我们行动吧。你觉得呢，隼人兄？

column10: We must avoid the streets. No doubt Noboru's men are looking for us.
column12: 应该避开街道行动。昇的手下肯定在找咱们。

column10: Masaru's residence is in this district. Let us listen in on his men.
column12: 真申的宅邸就在这边，去偷听他的手下的谈话吧。

column10: I am certain they will tell us where to find him.
column12: 他们肯定会泄露真申的行踪。

column10: I'd prefer having a disguise when listening in.
column12: 我更喜欢乔装后去窃听。

column10: Whatever. Let's get on with it.
The team enters the neighboring redlight district.
column12: The team enters the neighboring redlight district.

column10: The hanamachi. This brings back memories.
A citizen has cornered a female resident of the hanamachi (red light district).
column12: A citizen has cornered a female resident of the hanamachi (red light district).

column10: Then speak with the mistress of the house.
It is not for me to say.
The team passes through a residential area.
column12: The team passes through a residential area.

column10: Middleclass households. With more guards than usual I'd say.
column12: 这边都是中等家庭。没想到守卫也这么多。

column10: So it's true, the Shogun's son has been murdered?
column12: 真的吗？将军的儿子真的被谋杀了？

column10: It is not safe to go outside.
I heard the Shogun is on his way to Kyoto.
column12: 听说将军正在去京都的路上。

column10: I see they are looking for the killers.
column12: 他们应该是在搜查凶手。

column10: Did you know Lord Noboru's son is here.
column12: 昇大名的儿子就在这里啊，你居然不知道？

column10: Be wary, keep away from dark alleys.
column12: 小心点，千万别走黑巷子。

column10: The Shogun's son has been murdered.
It is not safe to go outside.
I hear the Shogun is on his way to Kyoto.
column12: 听说将军正在去京都的路上。

column10: They are looking for the killers.

column12: 昇大名的儿子就在这里。

column10: If I were you I'd keep away from dark alleys.
column12: 我要是你，就绝不走黑巷子。

column10: The team balances on ropes to cross the well guarded market street.
column12: The team balances on ropes to cross the well guarded market street.

column10: I suspect that guards here have been doubled since Noboru learned of our escape.
column12: 自从我们逃走之后，这里的守卫大概增加了一倍吧。

column10: That will do fine. Let us continue.
column12: 这身衣服还可以。继续行动。

column10: … you have been quiet lately, Hayato-san.
… best I can do. No idea how you can be so calm, like nothing happened.
column12: ……我在尽力克制。其实我不明白你怎么还能如此冷静。

column10: I was forced to master my emotions at a very young age. I am sorry if this bothers you.
column12: 我从小就被迫练习如何掌控自身情绪。如果影响到你了，我诚心道歉。

column10: The team eavesdroppes on Masaru's men.
column12: The team eavesdroppes on Masaru's men.

column9: has heard that Masaru enjoys himself at the bathhouse
column10: So he's in that place … Hayato-san, let us find a save spot and discuss what we have learned.
column12: 原来他在那里……隼人兄，先找到个安全地点会合，整理一下情报。

column10: The team knows that Masaru is currently at the bathhouse. It is unveiled as a new location in the level.
column12: The team knows that Masaru is currently at the bathhouse. It is unveiled as a new location in the level.

column10: It appears that Masaru is enjoying himself at the public bathhouse.
column12: 据说真申在浴场玩得还挺开心。

column10: No doubt he will have protection. Let us observe his movements. We may find an opportunity to isolate him from his entourage.
column12: 他肯定带着保镖。最好先观察一下他的行动规律，然后找个机会让他和保镖分开。

column10: After we take him, we must make a swift exit. I suggest we take the canal.
column12: 一旦抓到他必须迅速撤离。我建议走水路。

column10: Citizens are relaxing in the bathhouse area.
column12: Citizens are relaxing in the bathhouse area.

column10: Very well. Let us proceed as planned.

column9: knows his rage is getting the better of him
column10: How do you do it, huh? All that talking, bowing, smiling, after all that happened.
column12: 你究竟是怎么做到的，嗯？发生了这种事，还能像往常一样和敌人谈笑风生。

column10: How do you do it, huh? How can you act like nothing happened?
column12: 你究竟是怎么做到的，嗯？一举一动就像什么都没发生过一样？

column9: realizes she needs to calm him down
column10: If a woman does not surround herself with walls, she dies. All women learn this. If we must feel, we must do so in secret.
column12: 女人必须把内心藏在层层高墙后面，否则必死无疑。所有女人都迟早会体会到这个道理。即使内心汹涌澎湃，也断不能将感情流露人前。

column10: That's ... I want to kill that bastard Masaru and his father!
column12: 这些我……我只想把这个小杂种和他爹一块宰了！

column10: We cannot afford the luxury of rage, Hayato-san. Let my words be your walls. Reserve the cold hatred of revenge for when the time is right.
column12: 小不忍则乱大谋，隼人兄。听我一言，时候一到，此仇必报。

column10: The team discovers the bathtubs (large, wooden barrels for open air baths).
column12: The team discovers the bathtubs (large, wooden barrels for open air baths).

column10: This must be where he takes his bath.
Obviously. Where do they heat the water?
column12: 显然就是。烧水的地方在哪?

column10: The team give a hint how to isolate Masaru from his guards in the bathing area.
column12: The team give a hint how to isolate Masaru from his guards in the bathing area.

column10: Why not tamper with the fire. Bring the water close to boiling.
column12: 能不能煽煽火，把水烧得烫一点呢。

column10: Masaru wants to take a bath.
column12: Masaru wants to take a bath.

column10: A bath! I need a bath!
Ahh, almost perfect. Servant? More hot water!
column12: 啊……水温还差一点。来人，加热水！

column10: Masaru gets too hot water poured onto him. He curses and runs off to cool himself in the river.
column12: Masaru gets too hot water poured onto him. He curses and runs off to cool himself in the river.

column9: jumps out of the tub and runs down to the shore
column10: Aah! Hot hot hot, too hot! Aah! Aaaaah!
column12: 啊！烫烫烫，烫死我啦！啊！啊啊啊！

column10: Masaru cools down in the river.
column12: Masaru cools down in the river.

column9: cools himself off with cold water

column10: The team discovers the massage area.
column12: The team discovers the massage area.

column10: This must be where he gets his massage.
column12: 这里就是他做按摩的地方。
嗯，给他做按摩的是哪个？

column10: The team give a hint how to isolate Masaru from his guards in the massage area.
column12: The team give a hint how to isolate Masaru from his guards in the massage area.
嗯……他好像有个专用按摩师。

column10: What would happen if the masseur does not come.
column12: 假如按摩师不来他会怎样。

column10: Ugh, I want a massage, now!
Hmm, yes. Masseur! Get to work.
column12: 嗯，对了。按摩师！交给你了。

column10: The masseur hasn't appeared, so Masaru orders his bodyguards to look for him.
column12: The masseur hasn't appeared, so Masaru orders his bodyguards to look for him.

column10: He's keeping me waiting. Does he not know who I am? Find him!
column12: 竟敢让我等。他不知道我是谁吗？快给我找出来！

column10: The masseur appears and gives Masaru a massage.
column12: The masseur appears and gives Masaru a massage.

column10: Quickly, to the boat with him!
The team regroups at the north pier with their victim. They leave by boat.
column12: The team regroups at the north pier with their victim. They leave by boat.

column10: How is your temper, Hayato-san? Must I still fear for the safety of our hostage?
column12: 心情好些了吗，隼人兄？我还需要担心这位人质性命不保么？

column10: Teh … don't think so ... he's worth more alive.
column12: 嗯……不必担心……他的小命还有点用。

column10: Let us head to the safe house. Yuki and Takuma should be ready by now.
column12: 回藏身处吧。友希和琢磨应该也该准备妥当了。
